name.jp: 至尊のイーグルマント

description.en: The Hero's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +8 and HP Max by +400. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.ar: The Hero's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +8 and HP Max by +400. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.br: A Capa Águia do Herói aumenta todos os atributos base em +8 e vida máxima (HP) em +400. O Selo da Águia é exibido em destaque.
description.cns: 英雄级金鹰披风将所有基础属性提高+8，最大HP增加+400。披风凸显着鹰的印记。
description.de: Der Hero's Eagle Cloak erhöht alle Statuspunkte um +8 und HP um +400. Das Siegel eines Adlers wird stolz präsentiert.
description.fi: The Hero's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +8 and HP Max by +400. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.fil: The Hero's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +8 and HP Max by +400. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.fr: La Cape d'Aigle Invincible augmente toutes les statistiques de base de +8 et les PV Max de +400. Le Sceau de l'Aigle est bien en vue.
description.id: Hero's Eagle Cloak meningkatkan semua statistik dasar sebesar +8 dan HP Max sebesar +400. Segel Elang ditampilkan dengan jelas.
description.it: The Hero's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +8 and HP Max by +400. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.jp: 挑戦のイーグルマントは、全ステータスを+8、HPの最大を+400増加させます。鷲の紋章が記されています。
description.kr: 지존의 독수리 망토는 모든 기본스탯을 8, 최대 체력을 400 증가시킵니다. 독수리의 봉인이 확실하게 보여집니다.
description.nl: The Hero's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +8 and HP Max by +400. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.pl: The Hero's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +8 and HP Max by +400. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.ru: The Hero's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +8 and HP Max by +400. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.sp: La Capa Águila del Héroe aumenta todas las estadísticas base en +8 y la HP Máxima en +400. El Sello del Águila se muestra de forma destacada.
description.sw: The Hero's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +8 and HP Max by +400. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.th: Eagle Cloak ของฮีโร่เพิ่ม stat พื้นฐานทั้งหมด +8 และ HP สูงสุด +400 ตราประทับของนกอินทรีปรากฏอย่างเด่นชัด
description.tw: 全能力+8和HP+400的英雄之鷹斗篷，老鷹的樣式將顯現在斗篷上
description.vi: Áo choàng đại bàng của Anh hùng tăng tất cả các chỉ số cơ bản lên +8 và HP tối đa thêm 400. Con dấu của Đại bàng được hiển thị nổi bật.
